001package org.nasdanika.architecture.containers.docker.gen;
002
003import java.util.Collections;
004import java.util.List;
005
006import org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.AdapterFactory;
007import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.Diagnostic;
008import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.ResourceSet;
009import org.nasdanika.architecture.containers.docker.DockerPackage;
010import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
011import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
012import org.nasdanika.html.model.app.gen.SiteGeneratorContributor;
013
014public class DockerSiteGeneratorContributor implements SiteGeneratorContributor {
015
016        @Override
017        public void configureSemanticModelResourceSet(ResourceSet resourceSet, Context context, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
018                resourceSet.getPackageRegistry().put(DockerPackage.eNS_URI, DockerPackage.eINSTANCE);
019        }
020
021        @Override
022        public List<AdapterFactory> createActionProviderAdapterFactories(
023                        Context context, 
024                        Diagnostic instanceDiagnostic,
025                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
026                
027                return Collections.singletonList(new DockerActionProviderAdapterFactory(context, instanceDiagnostic));
028        }
029                
030}
